scripts.serve:start: npx pm2-runtime start node --name api -- --experimental-modules src/index.js
scripts.serve:stop: npx pm2-runtime stop all && npx pm2 delete all
scripts.docker-restart: docker stop whoisens-api; docker rm whoisens-api; docker run -dit -p 80:80 -p 443:443 --name whoisens-api whoisens-api
scripts.docker-restart-dev: docker stop whoisens-api; docker rm whoisens-api; docker run -dit -p 8089:80 -p 44389:443 --name whoisens-api whoisens-api
scripts.docker-deploy: npm run docker-build && sudo npm run docker-restart
scripts.docker-deploy-dev: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-restart-dev
